title: D-branes in an AdS_3 background
abstract: We study the possible D-brane configurations in an AdS_3 x S^3 x T^4 background with a NS-NS B field. We use its WZW model description and the boundary state formalism, and we analyze the bosonic and the N=1 supersymmetric cases separately. We also discuss the corresponding classical open string sigma model. We determine the spacetime supersymmetry preserved by the supersymmetric D-brane configurations.
